reviewText: I first have to say that I was disappointed overall in this video.  I own the complete series of Aaron Star's Hot Nude Yoga Virgin series 4 DVD Box Set and love them.  The yoga itself is good in this DVD but there isn't a class, the entire video is of just him.  I was expecting that this would be like his other videos where there was several men taking part.  The end credits shows some of his friends I guess enjoying some swimming and skinny dipping as the credits roll and that is it. It also says that there is Surprise Bonus Features which there wasn't like in his other videos. I feel kind of cheated here that in the description and on the cover there are  pictures depicting a "class" here, not just Aaron alone.  I will have to say that I won't be buying the rest of the Hawaii series and I am glad I didn't after getting and watching this one. I am again, Very very Disappointed.
